articles.content: Also among the 22 players also lining-up are Academy prospects John-Kymani Gordon, Tayo Adaramola, Seán Grehan, Kofi Balmer and Jack Wells-Morrison, who have each spent time with the first-team under… [+827 chars]

articles.title: Ivan Rakitic pokes fun at Romelu Lukaku after World Cup horror show - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sevilla midfielder Ivan Rakitic has joked that fans should be willing to pay for Romelu Lukaku to come on holiday to Split after his second-half horror show on Thursday.

articles.title: Ricky Ponting in hospital with heart complications during Australia v West Indies cricket test - Daily Mail
articles.description: Former Australian captain, champion batsman and television commentator Ricky Pointing left Perth Stadium around lunchtime during the test after feeling unwell and did not return to the ground.
articles.content:
Ricky Ponting has been rushed to hospital after a heart scare during the Perth test match against the West Indies.
